structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ACQUISITION OF WATERWORKS BY CITIES AND WATER DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Authority to acquire sewerage system with water system.
law.text: A sewerage system may be acquired with a water system and joined in one (1) project with the water system for the purpose of original financing.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954.
